mapper.sql: select id, zzjg_id, end_plantime, dispatcher, dispatch_time, bz_id, task_description, publish_status, task_status, walker_id, task_endtime, task_cxtime, site_description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sd_task_list
mapper.select: select t.id, s.tunnel_name,d.dept_name zzjg_id, t.end_plantime, u.nick_name dispatcher,t.dispatch_time, b.dept_name bzName,b.dept_name bz_id, t.task_description, t.publish_status, t.task_status, w.nick_name walker_id, t.task_endtime, t.task_cxtime, t.site_description, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time,p.dict_label publish,a.dict_label task from sd_task_list t left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id left join sd_teams b on b.dept_id = t.bz_id left join sys_user w on t.walker_id = w.user_id left join sd_tunnels s on s.tunnel_id = t.tunnel_id left join sys_dict_data p on p.dict_value= t.publish_status and p.dict_type = 'publish_status' left join sys_dict_data a on a.dict_value= t.task_status and a.dict_type = 'task_status' where t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into sd_task_list
id, task_name, tunnel_id, zzjg_id, end_plantime, dispatcher, dispatch_time, bz_id, task_description, publish_status, task_status, walker_id, task_endtime, task_cxtime, site_description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{id}, #{taskName}, #{tunnelId}, #{zzjgId}, #{endPlantime}, #{dispatcher}, SYSDATE(), #{bzId}, #{taskDescription}, #{publishStatus}, #{taskStatus}, #{walkerId}, #{taskEndtime}, #{taskCxtime}, #{siteDescription}, #{createBy}, SYSDATE(), #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.select: select e.tunnel_name sdName,s.id,s.task_name,s.tunnel_id,s.end_plantime,y.dept_name bzName,y.dept_id bz_id,s.dispatch_time, s.task_description,u.nick_name dispatcher,t.dict_label task_status,p.dict_label publish_status,s.task_endtime,s.task_cxtime,w.nick_name walker_id,s.site_description from sd_task_list s left join sys_user u on u.user_id = s.dispatcher left join sys_user w on w.user_id = s.walker_id left join sd_teams y on s.bz_id = y.dept_id left join sd_tunnels e on s.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id left join sys_dict_data t on t.dict_value = s.task_status and t.dict_type = 'task_status' left join sys_dict_data p on p.dict_value = s.publish_status and p.dict_type = 'publish_status' where s.id = #{task_id}

select A.* from sd_teams A left join sd_tunnels B on A.parent_id = B.dept_id
1=1 and A.status = '0'
AND (A.parent_id = #{deptId} OR A.parent_id IN ( SELECT d.dept_id FROM sys_dept d WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},d.ancestors) ))
AND B.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}
GROUP BY A.dept_id
mapper.update: update sd_task_list set publish_status = '1' where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select t.task_name,e.tunnel_name,d.dept_name zzjg_id,t.end_plantime,u.nick_name dispatcher,t.task_description,t.task_status,t.id from sd_task_list t left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id where 1=1 AND CONCAT(t.task_name, e.tunnel_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.taskName},'%') and t.task_status = #{params.taskStatus} and t.end_plantime < now() and (t.task_status in(0,1) or t.task_status = '2,4') and (t.task_status = '2,4' or t.task_status = '2') and (t.end_plantime BETWEEN #{params.startTime} and #{params.endTime})
AND (t.bz_id = #{params.deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{params.deptId},q.ancestors) ))
and publish_status ='2' order by t.task_status asc, t.create_time desc
limit #{params.pageNum},#{params.pageSize}

select t.task_name,e.tunnel_name,d.dept_name zzjg_id,t.end_plantime,u.nick_name dispatcher,t.task_description,t.task_status,t.id from sd_task_list t left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id where 1=1 AND CONCAT(t.task_name, e.tunnel_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.taskName},'%') and t.task_status = #{params.taskStatus} and t.end_plantime < now() and (t.task_status in(0,1) or t.task_status = '2,4') and (t.task_status = '2,4' or t.task_status = '2') and (t.end_plantime BETWEEN #{params.startTime} and #{params.endTime})
AND (t.bz_id = #{params.deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{params.deptId},q.dept_id) ))
and t.publish_status ='2' and (ISNULL(walker_id) or t.walker_id = #{params.userId}) order by t.task_status asc, t.create_time desc
limit #{params.pageNum},#{params.pageSize}
mapper.update: update sd_task_list set task_status = '1' ,walker_id = #{userId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select p.opt_type,u.nick_name opt_person_id,p.opt_time,opt_description,e.tunnel_name from sd_task_opt p left join sys_user u on u.user_id = p.opt_person_id left join sd_task_list t on p.task_id = t.id left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id where p.task_id = #{taskId}

select id, zzjg_id zzjgId, end_plantime endPlantime, dispatcher dispatcher, date_format(dispatch_time,'%m-%d') dispatchTime, bz_id bzId, task_description taskDescription, publish_status publishStatus, task_status taskStatus,task_name taskName, walker_id walkerId, task_endtime taskEndtime, task_cxtime taskCxtime, site_description siteDescription, create_by createBy, create_time createTime, update_by updateBy, update_time updateTime from sd_task_list
where bz_id = #{deptId} OR bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.ancestors)) and task_status in('0','1','3','4') and publish_status ='2'
order by task_status asc,dispatch_time desc,create_time desc

select id, zzjg_id zzjgId, end_plantime endPlantime, dispatcher dispatcher, date_format(dispatch_time,'%m-%d') dispatchTime, bz_id bzId, task_description taskDescription, publish_status publishStatus, task_status taskStatus,task_name taskName, walker_id walkerId, task_endtime taskEndtime, task_cxtime taskCxtime, site_description siteDescription, create_by createBy, create_time createTime, update_by updateBy, update_time updateTime from sd_task_list
where (bz_id = #{deptId} OR bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.dept_id))) and publish_status ='2' and ((task_status in('0','1','3','4') and walker_id = #{userId})or(task_status ='0' and ISNULL(walker_id)))
order by task_status asc,dispatch_time desc,create_time desc
select manager_id from sd_tunnels where tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}
select id from sd_task_list where id like concat(#{pid}, '%') order by id desc limit 1

select count(1) from sd_task_list t left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id where 1=1 AND CONCAT(t.task_name, e.tunnel_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taskName},'%') and t.task_status = #{taskStatus} and t.end_plantime < now() and (t.task_status in(0,1) or t.task_status = '2,4') and (t.task_status = '2,4' or t.task_status = '2') and (t.end_plantime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime})
AND (t.bz_id= #{deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.ancestors) ))
and publish_status ='2'

select count(1) from sd_task_list t left join sd_tunnels e on t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id left join sys_user u on t.dispatcher = u.user_id where 1=1 AND CONCAT(t.task_name, e.tunnel_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{taskName},'%') and t.task_status = #{taskStatus} and t.end_plantime < now() and (t.task_status in(0,1) or t.task_status = '2,4') and (t.task_status = '2,4' or t.task_status = '2') and (t.end_plantime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime})
AND (t.bz_id= #{deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.dept_id) ))
and t.publish_status ='2' and (ISNULL(walker_id) or t.walker_id = #{userId})

select stl.id,stl.finish_status,st.dept_name bz_id,su.nick_name walker_id,stl.task_endtime,stl.task_cxtime,stl.site_description,stl.task_status from sd_task_list stl left join sd_teams st on stl.bz_id = st.dept_id left join sys_user su on stl.walker_id = su.user_id where 1=1
and stl.id = #{taskId}
select * from sd_task_list where id = #{id}

select count(*) from sd_task_list where 1=1
and task_name = #{taskName}

SELECT t.task_name as taskName, -- 任务名称 e.tunnel_name as tunnelName, -- 隧道名称 d.dept_name zzjgId, -- 管理站名称 DATE_FORMAT(t.end_plantime , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endPlantime, -- 计划完成时间 u.nick_name dispatcher, -- 派单人员 t.task_description as taskDescription, -- 任务描述 t.task_status as taskStatus, -- 任务状态 t.id -- 任务编号 FROM sd_task_list t LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON d.dept_id = t.zzjg_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.dispatcher = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sd_tunnels e ON t.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id WHERE 1 =1 AND (t.bz_id = #{deptId} OR t.bz_id IN ( SELECT q.dept_id FROM sd_teams q WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},q.ancestors) )) and publish_status ='2' order by t.task_status asc, t.dispatch_time desc,t.create_time desc

SELECT e.tunnel_name sdName, -- 隧道名称 s.id, -- 任务编号 s.task_name as taskName, -- 任务编号 s.tunnel_id as tunnelId, -- 隧道编号 DATE_FORMAT(s.end_plantime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endPlantime, -- 计划完成时间 y.dept_name bzName, -- 管理站名称 y.dept_id bzId, -- 管理站编号 DATE_FORMAT(s.dispatch_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as dispatchTime, -- 派单时间 s.task_description as taskDescription, -- 任务描述 u.nick_name dispatcher, -- 派单人员 t.dict_label taskStatus, -- 任务状态 p.dict_label publishStatus, -- 发布状态 DATE_FORMAT(s.task_endtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as taskEndtime, -- 任务完成时间 s.task_cxtime as taskCxtime, -- 任务持续时间 w.nick_name walkerId, -- 巡查人员 s.site_description as siteDescription -- 现场情况描述 FROM sd_task_list s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = s.dispatcher LEFT JOIN sys_user w ON w.user_id = s.walker_id LEFT JOIN sd_teams y ON s.bz_id = y.dept_id LEFT JOIN sd_tunnels e ON s.tunnel_id = e.tunnel_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data t ON t.dict_value = s.task_status AND t.dict_type = 'task_status' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data p ON p.dict_value = s.publish_status AND p.dict_type = 'publish_status' WHERE s.id = #{taskId}

SELECT p.id,-- 巡查点清单 p.eq_name AS eqName,-- 设备名称 p.position AS position,-- 安装位置 p.eq_fault_description AS eqFaultDescription,-- 设备故障描述 p.fault_clstatus faultClstatus,-- 故障处理情况（0：无故障:；1：已消除:；2：未消除 DATE_FORMAT( p.xc_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS xcTime,-- 巡查时间 p.xc_status AS xcStatus,-- 巡查状态 u.tunnel_name AS tunnelName,-- 隧道名称 d.eq_id as eqId, d.pile,-- 设备桩号 Y.type_id as typeId, y.type_name AS typeName,-- 设备类型 fsd.mac, d.protocol_id, sdp.function_json FROM sd_patrol_list p LEFT JOIN sd_task_list t ON t.id = p.task_id LEFT JOIN sd_fault_list f ON f.id = p.eq_fault_id LEFT JOIN sd_tunnels u ON u.tunnel_id = f.tunnel_id LEFT JOIN sd_devices d ON d.eq_id = f.eq_id LEFT JOIN sd_devices fsd ON d.f_eq_id = fsd.eq_id LEFT JOIN sd_equipment_type y ON y.type_id = d.eq_type LEFT JOIN sd_device_point sdp ON d.eq_id = sdp.eq_id WHERE p.task_id = #{taskId} and p.patrol_type = '1' UNION ALL ( SELECT p.id, p.eq_name, p.position, p.eq_fault_description, p.fault_clstatus, p.xc_time, p.xc_status, u.tunnel_name, d.eq_id as eqId, d.pile, Y.type_id as typeId, y.type_name, fsd.mac, d.protocol_id, sdp.function_json
FROM sd_patrol_list p LEFT JOIN sd_task_list t ON t.id = p.task_id LEFT JOIN sd_devices d ON d.eq_id = p.eq_fault_id left join sd_devices fsd on d.f_eq_id = fsd.eq_id LEFT JOIN sd_tunnels u ON u.tunnel_id = d.eq_tunnel_id LEFT JOIN sd_equipment_type y ON y.type_id = d.eq_type left join sd_device_point sdp on d.eq_id = sdp.eq_id WHERE p.task_id = #{taskId} and p.patrol_type = '0')
select id, item_code, item_name, unit, device_type_id from sd_device_type_item sdti where device_type_id = #{typeId}
select device_state,state_name,is_control from sd_equipment_state ses where state_type_id = #{typeId}
